references.paper_title: Deep unsupervised learning using nonequilibrium thermodynamics
references.reason: This paper is foundational to diffusion models, introducing the use of nonequilibrium thermodynamics for deep unsupervised learning.
This paper introduced denoising diffusion probabilistic models, a significant advancement in generative modeling that underpins many of the techniques in the target paper.

references.paper_title: Diffusion models beat gans on image synthesis
references.reason: This highly influential paper demonstrated the superior performance of diffusion models compared to GANs in image synthesis, showcasing the potential of diffusion models.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduced high-resolution image synthesis using latent diffusion models, a key development in the field and directly relevant to the customized models discussed in the target paper.

references.paper_title: An image is worth one word: Personalizing text-to-image generation using textual inversion
references.reason: This paper introduced textual inversion, a method for personalizing text-to-image generation, which is directly relevant to the customized diffusion models discussed in the target paper.
